processing_steps.description: Remove TradeLocker entries (login IDs starting with 'D#')
processing_steps.reason: TradeLocker entries are not MT5 accounts and should be excluded from platform accounts

processing_steps.description: Remove duplicate purchase_ids, keeping first occurrence
processing_steps.reason: Database constraint violation - purchase_id must be unique

processing_steps.description: Remove duplicate logins, keeping first occurrence
processing_steps.reason: Database constraint violation - login must be unique
Accounts without group information cannot be properly categorized

processing_steps.description: Remove accounts that don't match valid platform group combinations
processing_steps.reason: Only accounts matching valid platform group combinations are included
